About LLM Profiles

Structured Data Profiles for AI & SEO

Note: This is an information page. For complete documentation, visit https://llmprofiles.org/

Our Mission

LLM Profiles bridges the gap between SEO and AI by providing opinionated, testable structured data profiles that work for both search engines and large language models.

What We Solve

Today's structured data landscape is fragmented and incomplete:

  • Schema.org provides a giant vocabulary but no opinionated guidance
  • Google's docs offer examples but no machine-enforceable validation
  • Teams struggle with over/under-using fields and inconsistent implementations
  • No bridge exists between SEO markup and LLM/RAG pipelines
  • No standard for training data exports that match your on-page semantics

Our Solution

Opinionated Profiles

Instead of Schema.org's giant vocabulary, we ship constrained subsets per use case with machine-enforceable validation.

Dual-Contract Design

Each profile includes both page schemas (for JSON-LD validation) and output schemas (for RAG normalization).

LLM-Ready Export

Publisher-owned training data exports that mirror your on-page semantics for RAG/fine-tuning.

Governance & Versioning

Canonical, versioned IRIs with immutability, CHANGELOG, and community PR checks.

Discovery Convention

Machine-readable discovery via /.well-known/llmprofiles.json for aggregators and partners.

Answer Engine Optimization

Built-in stable anchors, language hints, and anti-patterns for better AI retrieval.

Available Profiles

We currently offer 10 profiles covering the most common content types:

  • FAQPage - FAQ pages with Q&A pairs
  • Article - Blog posts and articles
  • Course - Educational courses and training
  • Event - Event information and schedules
  • ProductOffer - Product listings and offers
  • QAPage - Single question and answer pages
  • JobPosting - Job postings and career opportunities
  • LocalBusiness - Local business information
  • SoftwareApplication - Software products and applications
  • Review - Product and service reviews

Getting Started

Ready to get started with LLM Profiles?

  1. Visit https://llmprofiles.org/ for complete documentation
  2. Browse available profiles and choose one that matches your content
  3. Implement the JSON-LD markup following the profile guidelines
  4. Validate your implementation using the provided schemas
  5. Export training data for AI/ML applications
